messages: Someday, someone may experience{~N}these bizarre events. Hopefully,{~N}they will find my notes useful.{~E}
{~D}I don't have the map{~N}for this place.{~E}
{~D}Too dark to look{~N}at the map here.{~E}
There is a {~C2}First aid kit{~C7}.{~N}Take it?{~S4}
The lock is jammed.{~N}This door can't be opened.{~E}
{~L4}{~M}{~C3}10:00{~N}]Alchemy laboratory]{~N}{~N}Gold in an old man's palm.{~N}The future hidden in his fist.{~N}Exchange for sage's water.{~E}
{~L4}{~M}{~C3}12:00{~N}]A place with songs and sound]{~N}{~N}A silver guidepost is{~N}untapped in lost tongues.{~N}Awakening at the ordained order.{~E}
{~L4}{~M}{~C3}5:00{~N}]Darkness that brings{~N}the choking heat]{~N}{~N}Flames render the silence,{~N}awakening the hungry beast.{~N}Open time's door to beckon prey.{~E}
Cheryl might be here.{~N}I should search for her.{~E}
I don't know who drew it,{~N}but it is certainly in bad taste.{~E}
There is a switch.{~N}Do you want to press the switch?{~S4}
The valve is tightly shut.{~N}Can't move it.
Don't know what it is for,{~N}better leave it alone.{~E}
Moore, Ranaldo, Gordon...{~N}This must be the list of teachers.{~E}
